TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE , GPE .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
In DATE the applicant , who had been working as a driver and carried out other duties at FAC in GPE , was dismissed by the Minister of ORG .
On DATE the applicant lodged with ORG ( Sąd Rejonowy ) an action for reinstatement against ORG .
On DATE the court held the first hearing .
On DATE the applicant extended his action . He sought amendment of his employment record ( o uzupełnienie opini ) .
Subsequently , on DATE a hearing was held .
The hearing scheduled for DATE was adjourned because of the illness of the judge rapporteur and the next one , listed for DATE , was adjourned at the request of the applicant 's lawyer .
The next hearing was held on DATE .
Subsequently , hearings were held on DATE , DATE and DATE and on DATE .
On DATE the applicant further extended his action .
On DATE and CARDINAL DATE the trial court held hearings .
On DATE the ORG gave judgment in which it dismissed the applicant 's claim .
On DATE ORG ( Sąd Wojewódzki ) dismissed his appeal .
The parties did not lodge a cassation appeal with ORG .
